1.title: A Lesson in Safe Sex

 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Centered around a small, back water town in northern Ohio as a rash of violent and mysterious murders, linked to an ancient curse, spirals the community into complete chaos. In it's darkest hour the town's stiff as a board sheriff, Hubert Bolander, and his crack team of bumbling and idiot, deputies plunge themselves deep into the darkness as they attempt to solve the mystery and restore peace to the community.
imdb.title: Of Dark & Disturbing Things
plot: Centered around a small, back water town in northern Ohio as a rash of violent and mysterious murders, linked to an ancient curse, spirals the community into complete chaos.
